info.title: API de Sincronização Enjoy
info.description: Esta API tem como objetivo fornecer um serviço para a disponibilização de informações, permitindo que nossos integradores estejam sincronizados com a base de dados da Enjoy. A API segue o padrão REST, possibilitando a manipulação de clientes, produtos e pedidos na loja virtual. Atualmente, estão disponíveis as APIs: Clientes, Pedidos e Produtos.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort field (e.g., id, name, parent_id, created_at, updated_at)

get.summary: Get information about a specific category

get.description: Retrieve a list of customers with sorting, paging, and filtering options.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort orders by a specific field

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to retrieve per page

200.description: Successful response with a list of customers

post.description: Creates a new user and associates addresses with it.

cpf.description: User password. If not provided, it will be generated from the first six digits of the CPF.

default_address.description: Indicates whether it is the default address (true) or not (false).

message.example: Required fields are missing or incorrect.
There is already a record with the given email.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the customer to retrieve

message.example: Não há dados para o ID fornecido.
O parâmetro :id deve ser do tipo inteiro.

put.description: Updates a user and associated addresses.

default_address.description: Indicates whether it is the default address (true) or not (false).

message.example: Required fields are missing or incorrect.

404.description: There is no data for the given ID

message.example: There is no data for the given ID.

delete.summary: Delete a customer and associated addresses by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the customer to delete.

message.example: There is no data for the given ID.
The :id parameter must be of integer type.

get.description: Retrieve a list of addresses with optional sorting and pagination.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of records to skip for pagination

get.description: Retrieve a specific address by its ID.

message.example: There is no data for the given ID.
The :id parameter must be of integer type.

parameters.description: ID of the order to retrieve details for

get.description: Retrieve a list of products with optional sorting, pagination, and filtering.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort products by a specific field

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order products by a specific direction

message.example: There is no data for the given ID.
